ygData.subject: RE: Need info again
ygData.msgSnippet: I ever teamed with a lvl 22 wiz who did the same thing.  Later a low 20 necro join the team and he invited a train of 2 TT, 1 necro, 5-6 ogre and mob s pet
ygData.messageBody:
I ever teamed with a lvl 22 wiz who did the same thing. Later a low 20
necro join the team and he invited a train of 2 TT, 1 necro, 5-6 ogre and
mob's pet (dunno how he did it). All 5 players in the team kena killed and
I'm the only one who managed to gate out with 1/2 bubb mana.

Tat wiz later revive inside Derz room and it happened that Derz & her 2
necro spawn at that time. Guess what, he was killed 8 times on a row until
he pull out his modem line (he come back 2 hrs later and tell me). He told
me he lost more than 3 bubb xp and drop a lvl.

I think I better blind outside Najena zone. The room is always crowded
with campers, so no way u can gate in and kill (and by the time u gate in,
pple may have beat Derz to half death liao) ;)


On Thursday, 23 September, 1999 10:14 AM, Lim Choong Ee
[SMTP:choongee@...] wrote:
> From: Lim Choong Ee <choongee@...>
>
> jboots is pure camping no much tip can be given to help hehe
> there is one thing though, since u wizard, u can bind yourself
> inside the drelna room, so when it spawn u can immeidiatey tele
> in without delay n get the kills first.
>
